metadata.title: SARBIEN Designs Pregnancy Baby Announcement Bodysuit | Pregnancy Birth Reveal | Custom Baby Romper | Personalized Infant One Piece | Maternity, White
features: Expandable lap shoulder neckline to help pull garment easily over baby's head
Design is handmade from CPSIA Certified heat transfer vinyl in black and pressed with a professional heat press in Texas, USA.
Care Instructions: Turn garment inside out, machine wash cold or warm with mild detergent, tumble dry low or hang to dry. No fabric softener or chlorine bleach. Do not directly iron vinyl design.
description: Please make sure spelling/grammar is correct. I copy order details exactly as entered. I do not accept returns or exchanges on personalized items unless there has been an error on the seller's end. However, we want all of our customers to be 100% in love with our products! If for any reason you are not satisfied with your order, please contact us ASAP and we will do our best to fix it!
